title: A gruesome episode tells a painful story about corporate Japan
description: What happened to one delivery driver illustrates the costs exacted by workers’ sense of duty and obligation

title: Fitch cites civil unrest in downgrade of France’s credit rating
description: Rating agency warns pensions reform battle could thwart efforts to improve public finances

title: Carmakers raise concerns at Chinese dominance over connectivity patents
description: Led by Huawei, Chinese groups are filing patents around the tech that enables products to access the internet

title: Hedge funds retreat from bets against Italian bonds
description: Short sellers pull back after fall in gas prices and less political turbulence than expected

title: German debt reduction demands would be ‘straitjacket’ on EU, officials warn
description: German finance minister’s calls for tighter discipline meet resistance from Brussels and some leading states

title: Unknowns shroud Ukraine’s counter-offensive
description: Plans for a spring/summer attack by Kyiv have been kept very quiet but its objective is also not clear

title: How surreptitious shipping is helping Russia
description: Vessels masking their transmission signals explain the surprising resilience of Moscow’s wartime economy

title: Britain’s ‘Brexit capital’ shows signs of disillusionment with Tories
description: Independent candidates standing in next week’s local elections hope to make inroads into Conservative heartland
